amendment.description: Amendment to prohibit the EPA from using funds to implement, administer, or enforce the agency's 'Phase 2' fuel-efficiency and emissions standards, or any rule with respect to glider kits and glider vehicles.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 42 printed in House Report 114-683 to prohibit the EPA from using funds to implement, administer, or enforce the agency's `Phase 2' fuel-efficiency and emissions standards, or any rule with respect to glider kits and glider vehicles.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Black amendment (A034) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A034) offered by Mrs. Black.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Black amendment (A034) Agreed to by voice vote.
